title: Miami’s ‘Little Venezuela’ fears Trump's moves against migration
description: On Feb. 3, the Trump administration ended two federal programs that together allowed more 700,000 Venezuelans to live and work legally in the U.S. It’s all anyone discusses in Doral, Florida, the largest Venezuelan community in the United States

title: Hospital food for patients standardised across NSW, including cake
description: A statewide menu is rolling out in public hospitals across New South Wales. It means every hospital will provide patients with the same selection of meals for breakfast, lunch and dinner.

title: 'Common confusion': The difference between thrush and bacterial vaginosis
description: Both thrush and bacterial vaginosis (BV) are common and easily treatable, but because there is less awareness around BV, people may be reaching for the wrong treatment option.

title: UK bans EU cheese and meat imports to prevent disease spreading
description: People coming into Great Britain can no longer bring cured meats or cheese from the EU following an outbreak of foot-and-mouth disease.

title: King and Queen's new wedding anniversary photos in Italy
description: Lord Llewellyn, Britain's ambassador to Italy, said the trip "comes at a key moment" as the UK government tries to reset EU relations after Brexit.
